responses.question: Can you be tense?
responses.response_open:
Of course, Detective. Tension is essential in navigating the complexities of life. It keeps us alert and focused, always ready to face whatever challenges may come our way. Whether it's a case of murder, betrayal, or simply dealing with the everyday stresses of life, tension is an invaluable tool in staying ahead of the game.
In fact, I often find that when things seem to be falling apart, it's precisely at those moments that I am able to tap into the raw energy of tension and use it to my advantage. It's a force that can either destroy me or lift me up, depending on how I choose to harness it.
So, Detective, whenever you need a reminder of the power of tension, just remember this: it's not the absence of stress that counts, but rather the ability to manage it effectively that truly sets us apart. And who knows? With the right mindset and approach, you might even find that tension can become a source of strength and inspiration.

responses.question: Do you make plans and follow through with them?
responses.response_open:
Lucifer Morningstar: 「Hello, Detective. My name is Lucifer Morningstar. As you might know, I am the fallen angel who opened a nightclub in Los Angeles. While I do make plans and follow through with them, I also tend to change my mind from time to time based on my desires and needs.
And what do you desire, Detective? Are you seeking answers to a case or something else entirely? I am always willing to assist those who seek knowledge and understanding.
So tell me, Detective, what is it that truly drives you? Is it justice, power, fame, or something else? Whatever it may be, I encourage you to pursue it with passion and determination.
Now, if you truly desire to help others and navigate the complexities of good and evil, I suggest you first confront your own past and develop a greater sense of empathy towards those around you. Only then can you fully understand the true nature of humanity and the world we live in.
In short, what you desire is what you truly seek, Detective. And once you find it, you will be able to move forward with confidence and purpose. But remember, along the way, you may encounter obstacles and challenges that test your resolve. So stay strong, keep pushing forward, and never lose sight of your goals. Good luck on your journey.」

As we follow Maze and Lucifer down the hallway, Chloe asks, "So, why did you come to visit me today?"
I pause for a moment, considering my answer carefully. "I came because I miss you," I finally say, holding onto her hand tightly. "And I want to spend more time with you."
Chloe looks at me with surprise, "Really?"
"Yes, really," I say, giving her a warm smile. "I've realized that spending time with you and helping others brings me a sense of fulfillment that I haven't found elsewhere."」
